name: 维拉·迈尔斯 Vera Miles
intro: Vera June Miles (née Ralston, born August 23, 1929)[1][2] is a retired American actress who worked closely with Alfred Hitchcock, most notably as Lila Crane in the classic 1960 film Psycho, reprising the role in the 1983 sequel Psycho II. Other films in which she appeared include Tarzan's Hidden Jungle (1955), The Searchers (1956), The Wrong Man (also 1956), The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance (1962) and Follow Me, Boys! (1966).
birthplace: 美国,俄克拉荷马州,博伊西市
